title: Jeopardy AI Quiz
subtitle: Test your knowledge with this classic quiz game!
description: Play a Jeopardy-style quiz game powered by AI — create custom quizzes, play with teams, and test your knowledge in English or Italian.
ai_instructions: Enter 5 categories and the AI will generate questions and answers for each.

team_setup.min_teams_error: There must be at least 2 teams

how_to_play.title: How to play
list: On each turn, a team selects a cell from the board
If the answer is correct, the points are added to the team
If the answer is wrong, the turn passes to the next team
The team with the highest score at the end wins

landing.about_p1: Jeopardy AI Quiz is a web platform that allows you to create, share, and play Jeopardy-style quizzes generated automatically with artificial intelligence. It's designed for teachers, quiz organizers, friends' gatherings, and anyone who wants to test their knowledge quickly and fun.
landing.about_p2: The platform supports two languages (Italian and English), allows the generation of themed quizzes with customized categories, and offers features for team play, real-time scoring, and browser verification.
landing.instant_creation_desc: Generate entire quizzes in just a few seconds without manual effort
landing.features_subtitle: Everything you need to create amazing quizzes

feature_ai.title: AI Generation
feature_ai.desc: Create entire quizzes (5 categories × 5 questions) in seconds using advanced language models

feature_teams.title: Team Play
feature_teams.desc: Manage multiple teams with live scoring, turn rotation, and real-time leaderboard

feature_sharing.title: Sharing
feature_sharing.desc: Save and share quizzes with a link to resume gameplay at different times

feature_multilang.title: Multilingual
feature_multilang.desc: Content in Italian or English, with fully localized interface

feature_didactic.title: Didactic Mode
feature_didactic.desc: Perfect for quick assessments, study reviews, and innovative classroom activities

feature_quality.title: Quality Guaranteed
feature_quality.desc: Every question has a single correct answer and appropriately scaled difficulty

landing.how_works_desc: Choose categories or let the AI suggest them. The system generates five categories each with five questions calibrated for difficulty (100-500 points).
landing.save_time_desc: Prepare teaching materials in minutes, not hours
landing.save_time_details: From teachers to event organizers, everyone can create professional quizzes instantly
landing.benefit_4: Perfect for quick assessments and reviews
landing.faq_1_q: Can I modify the AI-generated questions?
landing.faq_1_a: Yes. After generation you can edit text, answers, and points via the integrated editor on the platform.
landing.faq_2_a: The app offers basic features for free. Some advanced features or integrations may require external services.
landing.faq_3_q: Can I export or save quizzes?
landing.faq_3_a: Yes: each quiz can be saved to the server and shared via a permanent link to replay or allow others to participate.
landing.faq_4_a: You can choose between Italian and English. The interface adapts automatically and quizzes are generated in the selected language.
landing.faq_5_a: Usually just a few seconds. The time depends on complexity and server load, but rarely exceeds 30 seconds.
landing.cta_subtitle: Create your first quiz in seconds and discover how easy it is to organize a memorable gaming experience
landing.footer_text: For technical requests, integrations, or collaboration proposals, contact us or open an issue on the repository. We can integrate with LMS and external services on request.
